hanzi-su-wiki:
峡

Значения

Ущелье; пролив

Мнемоника

Искажено. Справа — муж 夫, подмышками держащий по человеку (точки) в значении «захватывать, зажимать». Местность, ограниченная горами 山.

Варианты

峽

heisig_chinese_memo: A gorge is where God has cut into a mountain with a pair of scissors.
koohiiStory1: A gorge is where God has cut into a mountain with a pair of scissors. (synewave,6-10-2006) http://www.travelblog.org/Photos/197361.html.
koohiiStory2: A kid cuts a gorge into a paper mountain, with a pair of scissors.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: To the mountains you took your horned husband for you two to get married. (Society wouldn't accept a horned husband!) To hide even more from the prying eyes of society, you take your horned husband into a ravine.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine walking up the mountain in your wedding clothes so you can get married without anyone trying to stop you. Then, because you're still worried, you go into a ravine where you are read your marriage vows.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The ravine is still in きょうと though, because if you went outside the city your marriage wouldn't be legal. So you found a secluded, local ravine.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: This ravine runs right through the middle of きょうと, though most people don't notice it. That makes it the best place for a secret wedding to a horned freak-husband.
Ru_Radicals: 二 (два), 亠 (крышка), 人 (человек), 并, 大 (большой), 山 (гора)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: between (夹) the mountains (山) is a gorge
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: At the beach playing in the sand you first dig out a gorge, and then press from  both sides the sand to fill it back in and make a mountain.

Liushutong characters (3)

峡字的基本解释

峡
（峽）
xiá
两山夹着的水道：三门峡（中国黄河中游峡谷之一）。三峡（中国长江流经四川到湖北的交界一带所经过的三个峡谷，其中有“瞿塘峡”、“巫峡”、“西陵峡”）。海峡（两旁有陆地夹着的形状狭长的海，如“台湾峡峡”）。
指两山之间：峡谷（狭而深的谷地）。

峡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiá］
［《廣韻》侯夾切，入洽，匣。］
“峡1”的繁体字。
(1)两山夹水处。
(2)指两山之间。
(3)狭窄。
(4)特指长江三峡。

峡字的英文翻译

◎ 峡
gorge

峡字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　峽； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页311第06
【廣韻】侯夾切【集韻】【韻會】轄夾切【正韻】胡夾切，?音洽。【廣韻】巫峽，山名。蜀楚之交，山有三峽。【左思·蜀都賦】經三峽之崢嶸。【註】三峽在巴東永安縣，謂西陵峽，歸鄕峽，巫峽也。【盛弘之荆州記】三峽七百里中，兩岸連山無斷處，重巖疊嶂，隱天蔽日，非亭午不見日月。　又州名。秦將白起攻楚，燒夷陵，卽其地。魏武於此置臨江郡。後魏爲拓州，取開拓之義。周以其居三峽之口，因曰峽州。　又山峭夾水，亦曰峽。見前岬字註。　【集韻】本作陜。或作陿。

峡字的源字形

峡字的起名意思

：指两山夹水处，两山之间或两陆地之间的狭窄地带。

gorge
Basic explanation of words
gorge
(gorge)
xiá
The waterway sandwiched between two mountains: Sanmenxia (one of the valleys in the middle reaches of the Yellow River in China). The Three Gorges (the three canyons that the Yangtze River in China passes through at the junction of Sichuan and Hubei, including "Qutang Gorge", "Wu Gorge" and "Xiling Gorge"). Strait (a long and narrow sea with land sandwiched on both sides, such as "Taiwan Gorge").
Refers to between two mountains: canyons (narrow and deep valleys).
gorge
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiá］
["Guang Yun" Hou clip cut, enter into contact, box. ]
Traditional characters for "峡1".
(1) The place between the two mountains and the water.
(2) Refers to between two mountains.
(3) Narrowness.
(4) Especially referring to the Three Gorges of the Yangtze River.

gorge

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Word Department] 　 Gorge; Kangxi strokes: 10; Page number: page 311 06
[Guang Yun] Hou Jiaqie [Ji Yun] [Yunhui] Jurisdiction Jiaqie [Zheng Yun] Hu Jiaqie,? Yin Qia. [Guangyun] Wu Gorge, the name of the mountain. At the turn of Shu and Chu, the mountains had the Three Gorges. [Zuo Si·Fu of the Capital of Shu] Zhenrong by the Three Gorges. [Note] The Three Gorges is located in Yong'an County, Badong. It is called Xiling Gorge, Guiyang Gorge, and Wu Gorge. [Shenghong's Jingzhou] In the seven hundred miles of the Three Gorges, there is no break between the two sides of the mountain, the heavy rocks are stacked, the sky is hidden, and the sun and the moon are not visible at noon.　Also the name of the state. Qin Jiang Bai attacked Chu and burned Yiling tombs. Wei Wu set Linjiang County here. Later Wei was Tuozhou, taking the meaning of pioneering. Zhou called it Xiazhou because it lived at the mouth of the Three Gorges.　There are mountains and cliffs and water, and it is called the gorge. See note for the words before the cape.　【Jiyun】This is Shaan. Or Zuo Kou.
gorge
Source glyph
gorge
Name meaning
: Refers to the narrow zone between two mountains and water, between two mountains or between two lands.
峡
会意字。左边是山(像山),右边是夹(像两个孩子夹着一个大人),表示两山夹峙之地是峡;夹(jid )兼表声。峽简化
为峡。峡指两山相夹之窄地,中或有水。
两山夹水的地方: 山~|海~。
~谷 地~ 海~ 山~ 巫~
xiá
|峽
峽|峡
ущелье
Зная слово.
Слева находится гора (например, гора), а справа - папка (например, двое детей сжимают взрослого), что означает, что место, где встречаются две горы, - это ущелье; Цзя (джид) также выражает звук .
Ущелье упрощено до ущелья.
Ущелье относится к узкому месту между двумя горами с водой посередине.
Место, где находятся две горы и вода: гора ~ | море ~.
~ Долина ~ Море ~ Гора ~ У ~

Radicals: 山, 夫  (mountain, husband, horns)
Meaning Mnemonic
To the mountains you took your horned husband for you two to get married. (Society wouldn't accept a horned husband!) To hide even more from the prying eyes of society, you take your horned husband into a ravine.
Imagine walking up the mountain in your wedding clothes so you can get married without anyone trying to stop you. Then, because you're still worried, you go into a ravine where you are read your marriage vows.
Reading Mnemonic
The ravine is still in きょうと though, because if you went outside the city your marriage wouldn't be legal. So you found a secluded, local ravine.
This ravine runs right through the middle of きょうと, though most people don't notice it. That makes it the best place for a secret wedding to a horned freak-husband.
